author: 翟瑞民
title: 1月份全国发生31次4.0级以上地震，西藏定日地震直接经济损失达89.45亿元|界面新闻 · 中国
text:
界面新闻记者 | 翟瑞民
2025年3月6日，国家防灾减灾救灾委员会办公室、应急管理部发布2025年1月全国自然灾害情况。总体来看，地震灾害损失偏重，其中西藏定日6.8级地震致126人遇难，造成直接经济损失89.45亿元。
近日，国家防灾减灾救灾委员会办公室会同有关成员单位，对2025年1月全国自然灾害情况进行了会商分析。1月份，我国自然灾害以地震灾害为主，干旱、低温冷冻和雪灾、风雹灾害、森林火灾等也有不同程度发生。各种自然灾害共造成28.7万人次不同程度受灾，紧急转移安置14.2万人次，死亡126人，倒塌房屋2.69万间，损坏房屋22万余间，农作物受灾面积4.4千公顷，直接经济损失92.8亿元。
具体灾害方面，地震灾害损失偏重。据介绍，1月份，我国大陆地区发生4.0级以上地震31次，地震灾害造成21.6万人不同程度受灾，紧急转移安置14.2万人，死亡126人，倒塌房屋2.7万间，损坏房屋22万间，直接经济损失92亿元。
其中，最大震级为1月7日西藏日喀则市定日县6.8级地震，震源深度10公里，最大烈度达到9度，造成约26公里地表破裂带，震区局部人口集中，房屋抗震性能弱，截至1月底，已造成日喀则市定日、拉孜、萨迦、定结等7个县20万人不同程度受灾，紧急转移安置13.9万人，死亡126人，倒塌房屋2.69万间，损坏房屋21.5万间，直接经济损失89.45亿元。
最新消息显示，3月3日，定日6.8级地震8个整村推进村庄灾后恢复重建项目启动仪式在定日县长所乡古荣村举行，这标志着灾后恢复重建工作正式启动。另据中新社引述日喀则市官方介绍，地震导致定日、拉孜、定结、萨迦、昂仁5县共243所学校受灾，共有在校生4.76万人。3月5日，除308名学生因事因病请假外，4.73万余名学生均已正常到校开学。
此外，1月2日，宁夏银川市永宁县、金凤区先后发生4.8级、4.6级地震，造成4300余间房屋损坏，直接经济损失2.6亿元。四川阿坝州红原县4.9级地震造成500余间房屋损坏。
其他自然灾害方面，1月份，全国低温冷冻和雪灾损失偏轻，造成福建、云南、贵州等10省（区、市）3.6万人不同程度受灾，农作物受灾面积3.8千公顷，直接经济损失近6300万元。与近5年同期均值相比，受灾人数、农作物受灾面积、直接经济损失下降均超过九成。全国面上旱情总体较轻，广西、江西、浙江部分地区旱情露头，造成3.4万人不同程度受灾，3.1万人因旱需生活救助（主要分布在广西山丘区），农作物受灾面积近600公顷，直接经济损失300万元。全国共发生森林火灾30起，未造成人员伤亡。
3月4日，国家防灾减灾救灾委员会办公室、应急管理部发布3月份及全国两会期间自然灾害风险形势认为，3月份，江南、华南、云南东南部等部分地区强对流天气增多，洪涝和风雹灾害风险较高；华北、东北、江南、华南、西南局地森林火险等级高；西北部分地区低温冷冻和雪灾风险较高；华北、华东、中南、西南、西北局地地质灾害风险较高；华南局地存在干旱灾害风险。全国两会期间，北京地区有弱冷空气活动，需重点关注森林火灾风险。

author: world today news
title: Egyptian Court Acquits Girl of Assault Charges on Father After Father Begs for Pardon
text:
Al-Marsad
newspaper: An Egyptian court acquitted a girl of charges of assaulting her father by hitting her with a shoe, after the father begged the judge to pardon her, for fear of losing her future.
The security authorities had received a report from a housewife accusing her younger sister of assaulting her elderly father with shoes, slapping him in the face, insulting him, hurling obscenities at him in front of the neighbors, and abusing her. After codifying the procedures, the aforementioned accused was arrested and referred to the Public Prosecution for investigation.
The girl said before the prosecution that a neighbor complained to her that her father was quarreling with him and insulting him, so she blamed her father and beat him to discipline him and prevent him from repeating his actions.
The eldest daughter continued in her report: The last of these violations against the elderly father was that the youngest daughter, 23 years old, assaulted him by hitting him with a shoe, claiming that she was disciplining him because he insulted one of the neighbors. The eldest daughter asked the judiciary to punish her father.
The neighbors testified to the veracity of the incident before the prosecution, and that the accused assaulted her father with the “shoe” after they heard him repeating, “Also, you can hit my father with the shoe, Sanaa.”
#case #Egyptians #cry…a #girl #hits #father #shoe #surprising #ruling #court
2023-12-29 17:18:49

author: Dr. Tim Sandle
title: Gene therapy breakthrough in haemophilia treatment - Digital Journal
text:
Blood specimen tubes are seen in the laboratory of Bellville Medical Center in the state of Texas where hospitals are overwhelmed due to record Covid-19 hospitalizations. — © AFP Health Canada has approved Pfizer Canada’s gene therapy in Haemophilia B . This promises to be a significant medical breakthrough for those with the inherent blood condition.
With the announcement, Health Canada has approved the medicine BEQVEZ (fidanacogene elaparvovec). The medication is an adeno-associated viral (AAV) vector-based gene therapy drug for the treatment of adults (aged 18 years or older) with moderately severe to severe haemophilia B (otherwise known as congenital Factor IX deficiency). This is suitable in patients who are negative for neutralizing antibodies to variant AAV serotype Rh74.
Although strange sounding, the medication – fidanacogene elaparvovec – is a novel, investigational gene therapy that contains a bio-engineered AAV capsid and a high-activity variant of human coagulation FIX gene.
Adeno-associated viruses (AAV) are small viruses that infect humans and some other primate species. AAV is an attractive candidate for creating viral vectors for gene therapy, being used by molecular biologists to deliver genetic material into cells.
According to scientist Frédéric Lavoie, Canada Lead – Specialty Business Unit, Pfizer Canada ULC: “We are proud to introduce an innovative therapy for people living with haemophilia B in the form of gene therapy.”
Human gene therapy has been advancing in recent years and relates to technologies developed for the treatment of disorder or disease through transfer of engineered genetic material into human cells, often by viral transduction.
Health Canada’s approval for BEQVEZ was based on an open label, single arm Phase 3 BENEGENE-2 study, to evaluate the efficacy and safety of fidanacogene elaparvovec in adult male participants (age 18–65) with moderately severe to severe haemophilia B.
Haemophilia B is a blood clotting disorder causing easy bruising and bleeding due to an inherited mutation of the gene for factor IX (the absence of which causes the blood to take a long time to clot). Most individuals who have Haemophilia B and experience symptoms are men and Haemophilia B represents about 15 percent of patients with haemophilia.
The main objective of the study was to evaluate the annualized bleeding rate for participants treated with gene therapy versus FIX prophylaxis replacement regimen, administered as part of usual care. The study enrolled 45 participants.
The new treatment shows potential in reducing the burden of frequent infusions by providing, with a single infusion, a persistent liver production of factor IX, which could help improve the life of those affected .
Based on the World Federation of Haemophilia, more than 38,000 people worldwide were living with haemophilia B in 20211. In Canada, haemophilia B affects over 700 individuals.
The goal of the gene therapy for eligible people living with haemophilia B is that, once treated, they will be able to produce FIX via this one-time treatment, rather than having to regularly receive intravenous FIX produced from either plasma or recombinant technology.

author: Sourtech
title: Teléfono para Elon Musk: el cofundador de Xiaomi presentó su primer auto eléctrico y promete superar a Tesla - Forbes Argentina
text: Lei Jun, cofundador y consejero delegado de Xiaomi, presentó el jueves el primer vehículo eléctrico de la empresa, lo que supone la entrada del fabricante chino de smartphones en el competitivo mercado de los vehículos eléctricos. El multimillonario se abstuvo de revelar la fecha exacta de lanzamiento o el precio del SU7, abreviatura de Speed Ultra, pero sí afirmó que Xiaomi pretende convertirse en uno de los principales actores del sector a escala mundial. La compañía había dicho anteriormente que planeaba lanzar el coche en la primera mitad de 2024. "Después de tres años fabricando coches, me di cuenta de lo difícil que es esta empresa", dijo Lei. "Pero después de 15 a 20 años de duro trabajo, nuestro objetivo es convertir a Xiaomi en una de las cinco principales empresas de vehículos eléctricos del mundo". Como uno de los lanzamientos de producto más esperados del año, Lei se dirigió a un público repleto en el Centro Nacional de Convenciones de China en Pekín, donde describió algunas de las características del nuevo vehículo. Lei no reveló la autonomía de los vehículos eléctricos de Xiaomi, pero sí dijo que funcionarán con baterías fabricadas en colaboración con las empresas chinas BYD y Contemporary Amperex Technologies. También se dice que los vehículos son capaces de mantener su autonomía en condiciones de frío extremo, cuando normalmente consumen más energía para calentar el compartimento. Xiaomi afirma que el SU7 superará a los vehículos eléctricos de gama alta de Tesla o Porsche gracias a los avances de la empresa tecnológica en el motor del vehículo, la conducción autónoma y los sistemas de gestión de la batería. El lunes, Lei escribió en la red social china Weibo que el SU7 podría parecer "un poco caro". El modelo rivalizará en prestaciones con el deportivo totalmente eléctrico Taycan Turbo de Porsche, que puede recorrer hasta 627 kilómetros con una sola carga. También se fabricará con funciones de conducción inteligente similares a las del Model S de Tesla, según la publicación de Lei en las redes sociales. "Sin duda superaremos las expectativas de la gente", escribió el ejecutivo de 54 años en Weibo. El vehículo eléctrico de Xiaomi será probablemente una berlina de cinco plazas con techo panorámico de cristal, según un informe publicado en noviembre por el Ministerio de Industria y Tecnología de la Información chino. Un post publicado el jueves en la cuenta oficial de la empresa en Weibo también muestra un coche azul brillante con techo de cristal oscuro. Hoy ha desvelado otros dos colores, verde y gris. Mientras tanto, se espera que el mercado chino de vehículos de nueva energía crezca alrededor de un 20% el año que viene, hasta alcanzar los 11 millones de unidades, lo que significa que aproximadamente uno de cada tres coches vendidos en el país funcionará con electricidad, según estimaciones de la Asociación China de Turismos. La competencia entre los fabricantes de vehículos eléctricos, como Tesla y BYD, de Wang Chuanfu, ya es muy intensa y han recurrido a agresivos recortes de precios para arrebatarse cuota de mercado unos a otros. Lei dice que la competencia no le disuade, al menos en lo que respecta a la conducción autónoma. "Las tecnologías de conducción autónoma cambian muy deprisa, y empezar tarde tiene sus ventajas", afirma. "Significa que podemos trabajar desde un umbral más alto y construir a partir de ahí".

author: EIN Presswire
title: Crafting Elegance: Dennis Smith Entertainment Unveils Key Strategies for Memorable Luxury Events | Kalkine Media
text: Dennis Smith Entertainment Reveals Event Planning Insights and Musical Nostalgia to Elevate Luxury Celebrations Detailed planning and personalization are not just elements; they are the essence of luxury events.”— Dennis SmithUNITED STATES, December 28, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ -- Dennis Smith Entertainment proudly announces the publication of a comprehensive guide to usher in a new era of luxury event planning for 2024. Known for crafting bespoke experiences for grand weddings, anniversaries, and corporate events, Dennis Smith Entertainment merges traditional elegance with innovative trends. This latest article, '2024 Vision: Event Planning Tips from Dennis Smith Entertainment,' offers a treasure trove of insights and strategies for creating unforgettable moments. As industry leaders, Dennis Smith and his team continue to redefine the art of luxury events, ensuring each celebration is as unique and memorable as their distinguished clientele. The article '2024 Vision: Event Planning Tips from Dennis Smith Entertainment' is a guide to creating luxurious and memorable events in the new year. It details Visionary Themes to inspire unique celebrations, emphasizes Seamless Coordination for flawless execution, showcases Bespoke Entertainment for personalized experiences, and explores Technological Innovations to enhance guest engagement. Each section provides practical tips and visionary insights, reflecting Dennis Smith Entertainment's commitment to excellence in the world of luxury event planning. The article begins with "Visionary Themes," advocating for imaginative and resonant themes that capture the essence of 2024. It then moves to "Seamless Coordination," emphasizing the need for meticulous planning and collaboration. The "Bespoke Entertainment" section highlights how personalized entertainment can elevate an event. At the same time, "Technological Innovations" explores cutting-edge technologies that enhance guest experiences, ensuring every event is a pinnacle of modern luxury and style. "Detailed planning and personalization are not just elements; they are the essence of luxury events," Dennis Smith remarks. "Each event is a canvas, and meticulous orchestration ensures every stroke contributes to a masterpiece tailored uniquely to our client's vision." Further Articles From Dennis Smith Entertainment Dennis Smith Entertainment recently published two more articles, "The Definitive Birthday Party Checklist" and "Must-Play '80s Ballads for Your Next Bash," offering valuable tips and musical inspiration for luxury events. These articles reflect the company's expertise in creating tailored, memorable experiences through meticulous planning, exceptional entertainment, and a deep understanding of how details like music and ambiance can transform any event into an extraordinary celebration. The article "Planning Made Easy: The Definitive Birthday Party Checklist" from Dennis Smith Entertainment is a comprehensive guide for orchestrating a luxurious birthday celebration. It emphasizes the importance of budgeting, theme selection, and date choice while outlining key elements for success: an exceptional venue and ambiance, gourmet catering and fine beverages, and top-tier entertainment. It also highlights Dennis Smith Entertainment's role in providing premium party bands and exclusive activities to ensure an event is memorable and emblematic of prestige and grandeur. The "Bring the Beat Back: Must-Play '80s Ballads for Your Next Bash" article dives into the nostalgic and emotional resonance of '80s ballads, illustrating how these timeless tunes can set a romantic and engaging mood for any luxury event. It highlights iconic artists and songs from the era, the interactive joy these familiar tunes bring, and provides a curated list of top '80s ballads. Furthermore, it details how Dennis Smith Entertainment's premium party bands can bring these hits to life with skill and customization, making any event an unforgettable celebration of music and memoriesâ. Dennis Smith Entertainment's Role Dennis Smith Entertainment elevates luxury events with "Pure Custom Productions," delivering extraordinary, memorable experiences tailored to each celebration's unique theme and story. Coupled with "Premium Party Bands," the company offers most-requested bands with extensive customization, starting at $35,000 per performance, ensuring each event is a one-of-a-kind spectacle.â Dennis Smith Entertainment further enhances events with "Party Bands," offering top-market bands with exceptional artistry and choreography, starting at $15,000 per performance, ensuring every event vibrates with energy and fan-favorite music hits. Finally, Dennis Smith Entertainment offers "Intimate Entertainment Options," creating personalized experiences focusing on special individuals, couples, or moments. They tailor the entertainment to frame and highlight significant moments with special songs and other customized options, ensuring an intimate and memorable experience. About Dennis Smith Entertainment Dennis Smith Entertainment specializes in detailed event planning and entertainment services. For those interested in planning luxury events, the company provides a range of options to suit various needs and preferences. To learn more about their offerings and how they can assist in organizing your next event, consider visiting their website at https://www.dennissmithentertainment.com/ and contact their team for more information.Dennis Smith Dennis Smith Entertainment +1 770-262-1060 create@dennissmithentertainment.com Visit us on social media: LinkedIn Instagram YouTube

author: Duane Patterson
title: Vetting Isn't Just Looking For Someone Not Jewish, Democrats – HotAir
text:
The week of Walz continues, and despite being tapped to be the vice presidential nominee, it hasn't been a great one for America's newest dad, as regime media wants you to call him.
He's a normie, media claims. He's just like every middle-aged male in Middle America, they'll tell you. It took about 48 hours before the real Tim Walz began to be revealed, despite media's best intentions to roll him out in the most positive light possible.
Keep in mind how the week unfolded. Walz, who is not Jewish, became the backup plan for Kamala Harris, and this is how George Stephanopoulos on Good Morning America reacted.
Because Joe Biden was pushed to the curb by Barack Obama, Nancy Pelosi, and the Democratic Party elite, Kamala Harris and the DNC were put in the unenviable position of having to throw together an emergency ticket without the benefit of any serious vetting process.
Vetting, by the way, isn't just running the traps on a potential candidate's financial records, possible criminal skeletons in the closet, or any other political unexploded ordinance that could be used as opposition research for the other party, though that is definitely a big part of vetting.
What I'm talking about is the vetting that comes as the result of running a primary campaign. Typically, a candidate files for office, announces their candidacy, and then begins a grueling and expensive tour around the country to earn votes of citizens from their party. Those votes are earned by how they acquit themselves in town hall appearances, debates, media interviews, press conferences, rallies, and fundraisers. Kamala Harris engaged in exactly none of that for the 2024 cycle. She leapfrogged over all the vetting that would 'out' problems with campaigns that normally keep them from becoming successful.
If Biden had been pushed out a year ago, Kamala Harris would no doubt have run for president. She would probably have been the frontrunner at the outset, and she very well might have won the primary outright. But she almost certainly would have had competition from Bernie Sanders, Gavin Newsom, and possibly a whole host of up-and-comers in the party that would have viewed Donald Trump as vulnerable, and Harris as unelectable due to her not being able to robustly defend the Biden record, much less her own. But the process of the primaries would have sorted all this out.
Walz has gone through no vetting whatsoever, other than to check off the 'non-Jew' box. So what happens when the dirt begins to pile up on all facets of the Tim Walz story? The Harris campaign is AWOL. They aren't engaged and pushing back directly. If Walz actually had been vetted, the campaign would have known ahead of time what lines of attack would come, and they would be ready for it. They're radio silent.
Yamiche Alcindor, who is among the most left-leaning members of media, said this to Kristen Welker on MSNBC.
Other stand-in surrogates have been caught flat-footed, and maybe none more so than Tina Smith, who I've been told is actually a senator from Minnesota. Who knew? Here's her appearance trying to deflect from the Walz stolen valor scandal on CNN.
When you're trying to play military service whataboutism with J.D. Vance and you get fact-checked by Jim Acosta of all people, you know the Democrats aren't fully in command of their messaging. Van Jones even acknowledged this stolen valor story is going to be a problem.
So because Kamala didn't vet Walz, other than how close to her liberal ideology he appears to be, and, of course, the fact that he's not Jewish, there's been a torrent of material released online about the Minnesota governor. And it's not just on the stolen valor story, which we'll come back to in a little bit. The attacks on Walz can be classified into three buckets: Personal/character flaws, views and policy and issue sets, and his record as governor of the Gopher State.
On the personal and character front, as a 31-year-old teacher and professed high school football coach, Walz was arrested for driving under the influence of alcohol, testing well over the .08 limit in Minnesota, and was clocked driving 96mph in a 55mph zone. What makes the story worse is his campaign tried to get out from under it by claiming he was deaf and didn't understand what the state trooper was trying to tell him, deafness caused by his artillery service.
It's not true. He wasn't deaf, he wasn't an artilleryman, and it turns out he wasn't even the head football coach he claimed to be. He was an assistant coach . So he appears to have commited stolen coaching valor as well.
At the White House a week after Joe Biden's politically fatal debate performance with Donald Trump, Tim Walz in his role as chairman of the Democratic Governors Association led a delegation to ascertain first-hand whether Biden was still fit for office or not. His conclusion?
And to compound the lie in which he was participating as part of the left-wing cover-up of Biden's decline, he went on further to gaslight those bringing it up Biden's decline as ageism.
Tim Walz is a man who lies with extraordinary ease. At the Minnesota State Fair, Walz claimed kids only missed 10 days of school during the pandemic lockdown.
Of course, he shut down schools in March of 2020, and most of the schools did not go back to in-person learning until February, 2021, 11 months later. He's just lying to you. He does that a lot.
On the issues, he's every bit as radical as Kamala Harris is. On gender reassignment surgeries for children, he's militant.
On abortion, he boasts that he's more pro-choice than Nancy Pelosi.
On immigration, he's an open borders guy who actually used taxpayer money to set up an office for illegal migrants to have funding and assistance in order to integrate with the people already here legally.
Walz apparently wants our Navy to be powered on algae.
On virtually every issue, Tim Walz is as advertised - a progressive. He's not the centrist media is presenting. Here's Walz in his own words.
As governor, his track record is disastrous. Here's one ad just about letting Minneapolis burn for a week during the 2020 George Floyd riots.
Walz signed legislation redefining sexual orientation to include proclivities that would make Caligula blush. A Republican lawmaker tried to include a clause that would make adult-youth sexual preference an exception to the human rights protections provided as part of the bill. Democrats threw out that amendment, meaning grown-ups sexually attracted to kids are now a protected sexual orientation. Walz signed it into law.
Advertisement Governor Tim Walz redefined “sexual orientation” to include pedophiles.
Walz did so by signing law that removed @HarryNiska ’s amendment to excluded “physical or sexual attachment to children by an adult” from the state human rights law.
Here is Rep. Niska’s floor speech: pic.twitter.com/riRVxemGZX
— Dustin Grage (@GrageDustin) August 7, 2024 The 'Mind Your Own Damn Business' governor is also the one who instituted a snitch line during the pandemic so that your neighbors, otherwise known as one man's socialist, could rat you out.
The Democratic Party may be where Tim Walz and Kamala Harris are residing - the far-left of the political spectrum. But the country as a whole is not. The country is very much a split country, and the last two presidential elections have been decided by razor-thin margins in swing states.
This is why the stolen valor story could be so devastating to the Harris-Walz campaign. I did not serve. It's not for me to judge whether Walz' behavior, actions, and rhetoric since his time in the National Guard constitute stolen valor. What I can tell you is how the veteran community are reacting to the scandal thus far, and how badly the campaign has handled the story, cementing in the perception in the veteran community that Walz has for years claimed honor, rank, and service of which he is not due.
The number of veterans in Walz' company speaking out that served contemporaneously with him are growing in number, and none of them have anything good to say about his bailing out early. We had one such member who was blinded and suffered TBI (Traumatic Brain Injuries) on his deployment to Iraq, a deployment Walz chose to avoid, call into the Hugh Hewitt Show Thursday with guest host Mark Davis.
Tim Walz hasn't addressed this controversy personally. He hasn't taken one question on it, has offered no explanation. And he's kind of in a box right now, because it would be awkward for him to agree to an interview when Kamala Harris has refused to do so for 19 days. Harris surrogates are floundering in the meantime, and the veteran community, a very tight-knit one, is circulating this story with updates and newly-unearthed videos. And outside of Pothole Pete Buttigieg, Joe Biden's Transportation Secretary and a veteran, I've yet to see one retired service member of any branch downplaying this scandal as no big deal.
So does this matter? Remember me mentioning thin margins and such? In 2020, 43,000 votes over three states - Arizona, Georgia, and Wisconsin, decided the election for Biden. How many veterans live in the swing states? Federal data as of 2022 shows:
Michigan - 461,809
Wisconsin - 283,767
Pennsylvania - 638,436
Arizona - 454,620
Georgia - 678,304
Nevada - 205,615
North Carolina - 620,969.
That's 3,343,520 veterans over seven states. Granted, not all of them vote, and definitely not all of them are Republicans. But what made the Swift Boat campaign against John Kerry in 2004 so effective? It was the perception that set in, and the charges originating from both Democrat and Republican retired service members. It was bipartisan, and it resonated with the military veteran community the more time passed. Walz' silence risks the snowballing of this scandal into something that can no longer be managed. Look again at that number - 3.3 million and change. That's a big number. Think you can make the case that 50,000 of them might sour on the ticket because someone they perceive as committing stolen valor is on it?
Walz really only has one card to play, and he has to play it quickly. He has to sit down for an interview and offer a mea culpa. He has to give a believable argument that he had a young family and didn't want to go, and so yes, he took early retirement to avoid going. He's got to own up to it and offer some justification, any justification, for why. And it has to be the truth, because if he lies about his mea culpa and gets caught, the Walz Veep boomlet will be over before it really got started. But he has to do an interview. But again, how does the vice presidential nominee agree to an in-depth interview when the presidential nominee can't and/or won't?
Concluding where I began, with the lack of vetting problem, let's say the scandal does get worse over the next two weeks, and Walz on the ticket becomes untenable. He might be forced to withdraw from the ticket, saying the election is too important to be a distraction. What then?
Well, unlike the Republican National Convention, where the GOP delegates all cast a positive vote for J.D. Vance to be the vice presidential nominee on the first night, there was no such vote with the DNC delegates.
In order to comply with Ohio laws on qualifying for the ballot, the delegates convened by conference call and nominated Kamala Harris for president last week before she had picked Walz as her number two. The delegates gave Harris and the party a blank check, in essence, by voting to approve whomever the vice president would eventually be. So If Walz has to back out, Harris and the DNC can simply go back to the 'not-Jew' well for whomever they think the media will fall in love with next and go with that.
Then, of course, the vetting cycle online begins anew.
All, of course, in the name of muh democracy.

author: ncregister.com
title: Ground News - 20 Riot Police Sent to Remove 10 Young People Praying Rosary at Abortion Facility in Spain
text:
Summary by ncregister.com Nicolás de Cárdenas/ACI Prensa A 40 Days for Life volunteer tries to pray for the end of abortion in Madrid in front of the police present on Dec. 28, 2023. On Dec. 28, the feast of the Holy Innocents, the officers also arrested Dr. Jesús Poveda, who was staging a one-man sit-in at the doors of the Dator facility. Share menu More

author: ohtadmin
title: Axe inducts 15 new NHS members
text: On March 17 at the Verona Hills Golf Club, the Delecti Duces Chapter of the National Honor Society at Bad Axe High School inducted 15 new members. With this addition to the chapter, the membership is now 35 students. New members are, in front: Daniel Ma, Jenny English, Iva Davis, Lucie Kaczuk, Jade Bolzman, Megan Sievert, Anais Martin Rodriguez, Emma Bucholz. Back: Wyatt Clarent, Chase Murawski, Ben Kubacki, Grant Smith, Ian Harris, Brady Bachman. Missing: Kailyn Hagan. (Photo Courtesy of Matt V. Photography)
